flawed_nl_solution:
The cost of the movie online was twice what Mike paid, so 2 * 5 = ${<<2*5=10>>10}.
The shopping costs were standing at 4/5 * 10 = ${<<4/5*10=25/2>>25/2}.
So in total Steve paid 10 + 25/2 = ${<<10+25/2=45/2>>45/2}.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 25/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
